member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter
member.summary: Exports diagrams to Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) files.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.Export(MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Diagram,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a PDF file representing the specified diagram.
member.param: A reference to the diagram that will be exported.
The full path to the PDF file.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.m_bDrawInvisible
member.summary: Specifies whether invisible items should be drawn.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.m_bAutoOrientation
member.summary: Specifies whether the pages should be auto-rotated.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.Margins
member.summary: Gets or sets the margins for the PDF pages.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.AutoScale
member.summary: Specifies whether the diagram should be scaled to fit one or more pages of the PDF document.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale of the PDF output relatively to the original on-screen size of the diagram.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.AutoOrientation
member.summary: Specifies whether the exporter should choose the PDF page orientation automatically.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.InvisibleItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether invisible items should be exporter.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.PageOrientation
member.summary: Gets or sets page orientation that is set to the resulting PDF pages.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.PdfExporter.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets PDF page size.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.AutoScale
member.summary: Specifies the auto-scale mode when exporting to a PDF document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.AutoScale.FitToPage
member.summary: Scales the chart (aspect ratio is preserved) to fit the page bounds if the document is too large.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.AutoScale.FitToPageNoUpScale
member.summary: Scales down the chart (aspect ratio is preserved) to fit the page bounds if the document is too large. Otherwise chart's size is left untouched.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.AutoScale.FitToWidth
member.summary: Scales down the chart (aspect ratio is preserved) to make sure that the width of the chart is less than the width of the PDF page.
